mapper.sql: BUSINESS_CASE,PRODUCT_CODE, CUSTOMER_CODE, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_TYPE, ORIG_ORG_CODE, ORIG_ORG_NAME, DEST_ORG_CODE, DEST_ORG_NAME, UNIFIED_SETTLEMENT_TYPE,CONTRACT_ORG_CODE,CONTRACT_ORG_NAME,WAYBILL_NO,BILL_NO,ACCOUNT_DATE, BUSINESS_DATE, BILL_PARENT_TYPE, BILL_TYPE, AMOUNT/100 AMOUNT, AMOUNT_FRT/100 AMOUNT_FRT, AMOUNT_PUP/100 AMOUNT_PUP, AMOUNT_DEL/100 AMOUNT_DEL, AMOUNT_PKG/100 AMOUNT_PKG, AMOUNT_DV/100 AMOUNT_DV, AMOUNT_COD/100 AMOUNT_COD, AMOUNT_OT/100 AMOUNT_OT

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BIG_TYPE, BIGTYPE_NAME FROM STV.T_STL_BIG_SUBTYPE_CODE R WHERE TABLE_NAME=#{tableName} ORDER BY R.BIGTYPE_NAME
